entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CollectionView with IsGrouped="True" - RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand not Firing #25889
  • Visual Studio 17.12 and .NET 8 requires XCode 16 #25888
  • ContentPresenter just rendering component string in .Net9 #25887
  • [iOS] Command event spills to parent if child command is busy (when ICommand CanExecute is false) #25885
  • WMC1006 compile error for Windows MAUI .NET 9 project when referencing Microsoft.Identity.Client.Desktop #25883
  • [BUG] Memory Leak using SkiaBitmapExportContext #25881
  • iOS 18.0+ Maui bug with MediaPicker.PickPhotoAsync #25879
  • Use Configuration.StartsWith('Debug') instead of Configuration == 'Debug' for Debug specific build settings #25874

Closed

  • AOT compile aot-instances.dll, the AOT compiler exited with code 139. #25890
  • Group Collection View - Expected dequeued view to be returned to the collection view in preparation for display #25878
  • In windows and ios the RequestedThemeChanged event only fires the first time. #25864
  • After updating Microsoft.Maui.Controls and Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Compatibility to version 9.0.0, I am facing issues with the handlers in MauiProgram.cs file #25850
  • [Android] App hangs on splash after clearing data/cache #25876
  • Default configurations for Debug and Release mode #25675
  • "Object reference not set to an instance of an object." when using a Preferences.Default.Get in MAUI #25676

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] More Appium actions #25886
    area-testing
  • [iOS] Fix for ItemSpacing not properly applied between the item and group header in CollectionView Horizontal LinearItemsLayout #25882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Housekeeping] Moved a UI test to the proper place #25877
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [ci] Fix the internal build and update arcade #25875
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • Fix android image loading race condition and improve logging #25870
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Updating a Border.TranslationY does not work in Android - fix #25760
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fix disabled WebView Cookie Tests #24978
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, .NET 9 SR2
  • [housekeeping] Use MSBuild for provisioning Android SDK, Appium #25288
  • Fix Disabling some image tests after updating net9.0 with main #25770
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865
    area-xaml
  • [Windows] Fix FlyoutPage ShouldShowToolbarButton when overridden to return false, still shows button in title bar #25857
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨
  • Add Localization tests #25620
    area-testing, area-localization
  • Fix OnNavigatedTo not called when navigating back to a specific page #25552
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changing - fix #24766
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Custom back button image color #24993
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titlebar
  • [Android] ClearButtonVisibility with margin fix #25392
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Changing shape background color with dataTrigger #25544
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix for frame disappears when assigning GradientStops to LinearGradientBrush inside this Frame #25851
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨, area-controls-frame
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
    area-layout, area-controls-button
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Relative source binding for gradient stop fix #20287
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [Testing] Implement themes change in Appium actions on Windows #25863
    area-testing
  • Implemented ios:Slider.UpdateOnTap #20124
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-slider
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Android Shell BackButtonBehavior TextOverride #20179
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed picker title's color #20205
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Fixed auto picker resizing after selection #20207
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Swipe view improvements #25233
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • Inheriting Visual States #20467
    area-xaml, community ✨
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [iOS] Html label not applying bold or italics #20488
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-switch
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] PullToRefresh activity indicator improvements - fix #20824
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-refreshview
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • Page and control Unloaded events - fix #23196
    area-core-lifecycle, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed the picker title's color #23075
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Shadow for clipped visual element #23872
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage on theme change #24429
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • BarBackground with Brush in TabbedPage on theme change #24425
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • [Android] Reset ListView ScrolledEventArgs.ScrollY when ItemsSource changes #25362
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-listview
  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening - fix #25397
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [iOS] Ensure Subviews are Not Covered by Tab Bar #25490
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Character spacing in button - fix #25657
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 9 #25815
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 10 #25847
    area-testing, community ✨
  • TableView title issue fix on iOS and windows platforms. #25414
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview, .NET 9 SR2
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Android] Navigation bar - left margin fix #20967
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, community ✨
  • [iOS] Disabled Editors Show Keyboard Partially When Tapped - Fix #21347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] Navigation icon blink fix - shell (#18867) #21455
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - UI-Test #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Entry & Picker VerticalTextAlignment ignored #21966
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-picker
  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [Android] Encoding webview's source #24002
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [iOS] Using long-press navigation on back button - fix #24003
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] DatePicker (Format='D') #24296
    community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Android] RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand of CarouselView is not triggered #25574
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
